page.title: 04A typical Tuesday of a child
page.content: I wake up at 7.35 a.m.,get dressed and go to see my baby brother.I take him downstairs and put him in his baby-walker.I then have my breakfast, prepare my lunch and start out for school at half past eight.Mr Davies blows the whistle at five minutes to nine and I go into school.When the register has been marked we go to the Hall for assembly,which usually takes about twenty minutes.We then have lessons,usually Maths and Language for the rest of the morning,except for a fifteen minutes break.Lunch break is from 12.00 to 1.15 then in the afternoon we have Religious Education and Games.School ends at 3.30.I watch television and play with my friend until tea time.After tea I have a shower,watch television or read until 9.00 when I go to bed.
